DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate reproducibility active bladder symptom score ( OABSS ) Asian country .
DOC.brief_title: Reproducibility Study Over Active Bladder Symptom Score OABSS
DOC.criteria: Symptoms OAB 3 month longer At least 1 urgency episode last 3 day Symptoms OAB verify screen 3day bladder diary , define : Number micturition ≥8 times/day Number urgency episode 3 day ≥1 Indwelling catheter practice intermittent selfcatheterization Symptomatic urinary tract infection , chronic inflammation Diabetic neuropathy
